title.narrative: Sustainable Development Goals, In Particular Goal 11 On Cities, Work Related To Indicators, Tools Capacity Building And Monitoring

description.narrative: This project is well aligned with other ongoing work on addressing the monitoring challenges of SDGs. This includes supporting the complimentary work of addressing the spatial data collection challenges supported by a grant from Norway, and the complimentary Development account project which is supporting the capacity development/strengthening of the national statistical systems to respond to the wider needs of the SDGs. At selected country levels (Botswana, Tunisia, Colombia, Mexico), there is ongoing work or discussions to support the implementation of the city prosperity initiative—an integrated approach to monitoring all aspects of the city systems. These projects will be strengthened by the novel work that will be done on the piloting of the national sample of cities in the target countries.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

sector.narrative: Multisector aid for basic social services

title.narrative: EA 1: Enhanced technical capacity of the selected 4 countries and 8 cities to adopt and implement a reliable urban local monitoring framework (that produces reliable, timely, and disaggregated national, regional and global monitoring data).

description.narrative: EA 1: Enhanced technical capacity of the selected 4 countries and 8 cities to adopt and implement a reliable urban local monitoring framework (that produces reliable, timely, and disaggregated national, regional and global monitoring data).

title.narrative: At least 6 out of the 8 target cities adopt and implement the City Prosperity Initiative as the local monitoring framework for SDGs urban indicators by 2019.

description.narrative: At least 6 out of the 8 target cities adopt and implement the City Prosperity Initiative as the local monitoring framework for SDGs urban indicators by 2019.

title.narrative: EA 2: Strengthened national capacity of the 4 beneficiary countries to adopt and implement systems and tools to aggregate city information that enables national, regional and global monitoring and reporting.

description.narrative: EA 2: Strengthened national capacity of the 4 beneficiary countries to adopt and implement systems and tools to aggregate city information that enables national, regional and global monitoring and reporting.

title.narrative: IA 2.1 3 out of the 4 target countries design and implement National Sample of Cities methodology (to increase data comparability, measurement standards and national averages for country, regional and global aggregations).

description.narrative: IA 2.1 3 out of the 4 target countries design and implement National Sample of Cities methodology (to increase data comparability, measurement standards and national averages for country, regional and global aggregations).

title.narrative: IA 2.2 National Action Plans for the implementation of the national sample of cities are developed and adopted in all beneficiary countries.

description.narrative: IA 2.2 National Action Plans for the implementation of the national sample of cities are developed and adopted in all beneficiary countries.
